cascade.text: police have clarified that there were two shootings in ottawa today, not three: at the war memorial and parliament hill.
@CTVNews you guys "confirmed" there were 3 shootings not long ago. How about you wait for official reports before saying things.
“@CTVNews: Police have clarified that there were two shootings in Ottawa today, not three: at the War Memorial and Parliament Hill.” wow
